entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:46 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
